metadata.title: CVE-2023-38056 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of commands allowed to be executed via OTRS SystemConfiguration e.g. SchedulerCronTaskModule using UnitTests modules allowsany authenticated attacker with admin privileges local execution ofCode.This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.45, from 8.0.X before8.0.35; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
